channel.title: Making a free server?
channel.description: Alright, I've played mopar for like 2 months now and I would like to make my own server. I have a few questions though on how to do it. What exactly is the difference between a private server and a regular server? How do I make a FREE server that I can call my own? Where do I find the scripts to customize my server to my content? How do I set up my server? ect ect ect basically I don't know like anything on how to make a server but I am very eager to learn how. I know what scripts are what java is ect but I don't know how to make scripts or anything...is there any chance that someone could teach me? If it's too much trouble then don't bother.

item.title: Making a free server?

item.description:
@Van_Tango wrote:

Ok, I downloaded Himachi. In security it says something about “Disabling vulnerable Windows Services over Himachi” with a box next to it…should I put a check in the box or leave it blank?

item.title: Making a free server?
item.dc:creator: @owningme1 owningme1
item.description:
@owningme1 wrote:

Van Tango:

Alright, I’ve played mopar for like 2 months now and I would like to make my own server. I have a few questions though on how to do it. What exactly is the difference between a private server and a regular server? How do I make a FREE server that I can call my own? Where do I find the scripts to customize my server to my content? How do I set up my server? ect ect ect basically I don’t know like anything on how to make a server but I am very eager to learn how. I know what scripts are what java is ect but I don’t know how to make scripts or anything…is there any chance that someone could teach me? If it’s too much trouble then don’t bother.

look at the tutorial posted in the Tutorial section by Mod Taharok. and by the way, just a question, why are you a FIRST TIME POSTER if you have been playing two months?

Read full topic
